name: PR (Public Rela
what_you_do: Andrea Holland is a PR entrepreneur, consultant, and coach who helps PR professionals level up their careers and build their own PR practices.
who_you_serve: She serves PR professionals, entrepreneurs, and businesses looking to enhance their public relations strategies and practices.
signature_programs: How to Build Your Own PR Practice, 3 Secrets To Build Your Own PR Practice
current_projects: Masterclass on building a PR agency
bio: Acclaimed speaker, published author, instructor for LinkedIn Learning, managed PR teams for major brands like Intuit, PayPal, and Visa.
